scripts.build:android: npx eas-cli build --local --platform android --profile preview-simulator --output builds/android.apk
scripts.build:ios: npx eas-cli build --local --platform ios --profile preview-simulator --output builds/ios.tar.gz
scripts.sherlo:test: npx sherlo test:standard --android builds/android.apk --ios builds/ios.tar.gz --token XXXXXXXX
